data.description:
Experience the thrilling world of Orangu, where you can run, jump, bounce, and climb! Step into the shoes of a monkey species that we've created exclusively for this game. Embark on exciting adventures across a variety of maps, including the Forest, Shop, Zero-G Soccer, and even a Horror Mode. Engage with other players through our multiplayer feature, fostering a sense of community as you explore Orangu together. If you prefer playing with a specific group, easily join a private room accessible from your computer.

Express your unique style by customizing your appearance. Personalize your nametag, choose different colors, and enhance your character with cosmetic items available for purchase using our virtual currency called fruits. Head over to the shop to browse a wide selection of cosmetics. When you've made your choice, scan the desired item using our (Totally Not A Toilet) Item scanner, and equip them conveniently from the nearby inventory station.

Orangu is regularly updated with fresh content, including new maps and cosmetics, ensuring there's always something exciting to discover. So why wait? Join the adventure and start playing today!
